title: Operational definition of serious mental illness

content.prompt: Which of the following could be an operational definition for serious mental illness (SMI) in this national survey?

choices.label: A mental, behavioral, or emotional disorder that healthcare professionals commonly diagnose.
A mental, behavioral, or emotional disorder resulting in limits to one or more major life activities.
A mental, behavioral, or emotional disorder that may require medication for treatment.
A mental, behavioral, or emotional disorder that is highly stigmatized by society.
